23

23/2	11	1
11/2	5	1
5/2		2	1
2/2		1	0
1/2		0	1

23 = 0b10111

128

128/2	64	0
64/2	32	0
32/2	16	0
16/2	8	0
8/2		4	0
4/2		2	0
2/2		1	0
1/2		0	1

128 = 0b10000000

34

34/2	17	0
17/2	8	1
8/2		4	0
4/2		2	0
2/2		1	0
1/2		0	1

34 = 0b100010

256

256/2	128	0
128/2	64	0
64/2	32	0
32/2	16	0
16/2	8	0
8/2		4	0
4/2		2	0
2/2		1	0
1/2		0	1

256 = 0b100000000
